name: From The Dark (jrleavey, melijackson, Richard_Cortez, sheab, Gracie Sanabria)
name_original: From The Dark (jrleavey, melijackson, Richard_Cortez, sheab, Gracie Sanabria)
description:
• Face off against three unique monsters!
  • Adapt to their different patterns and navigate their nightmarish domains!
  • Utilize your various skills to out-maneuver your fears and claim your comforting objects!

Three terrible nightmares have claimed your favorite childhood objects! Each one represents a childhood fear, and must be avoided carefully. There is the terrible "Eye" monster, who can see far into the distance to find the player. The horrific "Blind" monster, who hunts for you through sound. And finally, the dreaded "Invisible" monster, who can be difficult to keep track of!

Explore three different locations, each one housing a different monster! "Under the Bed", a large cavern full of fireflies and various rock formations. The denizen of this realm hunts by sound! Navigate the terrible Closet maze, home to the Seeing monster! And finally, explore a twisted rendition of a backyard, housing the unseen invisible monster!

Use your skills to find your lost objects! You are equipped with a flashlight to illumnate your surroundings, but beware as it can also give your position away! You can also throw a toy ball to distract the monster, giving you a chance to reposition. And finally, you can activate your "Second Sight" ability, allowing you to see from the monster's point of view! Use these skills to track and avoid each monster and escape your nightmares!
